headline: AT&T Amazon Cloud And Satellite Deals Reframe Fiber And Broadband Story
summary: AT&T (NYSE:T) has announced new partnerships with Amazon Web Services and Amazon Leo to modernize U.S. connectivity. The collaboration focuses on linking AWS data centers with AT&T’s high capacity fiber network. Amazon Leo will work with AT&T to extend fixed broadband into underserved areas across the country. For investors watching NYSE:T, this news comes with the stock at $27.13, following returns of 3.5% over the past week and 13.1% over the past month. The 1 year return of 15.4% and...
